content:
Hi Team,
I see the current version of the USCore IG, which is not yet published and there are some new profiles also coming in future. I just wanted to know is there any tentative date or month we can assume when the current version will be released or published? Please help.

you can go to the Cross-Group Projects minutes to find out information about publishing and balloting of US-Core. CGP is the owner of the project. The new version v3.2.0 is about to be balloted. After balloting, we will be handling the comments and then it will be published, assuming all goes well. I would expect that to occur in the March timeframe? @Eric Haas @Brett Marquard

That version (tentatively 3.2.0) of US Core is going to ballot (HL7 Ballot schedule) and the hope is to reconcile and be ready to publish by the 2 quarter of 2021. You are welcome to participate in the ballot of the guide. The new profiles are really a repackaging of the FHIR core vitals profiles to provide more specific guidance around the must support requirements.
